ygData.subject: RE: thoughts on screaming mace?
ygData.msgSnippet: I also picked up a screaming mace in the last 2 weeks and when I began using it at level 24 my 1H-Blunt skill was about 35.  The weapon NEVER started to proc
ygData.messageBody:
I also picked up a screaming mace in the last 2 weeks and when I began using
it at level 24 my 1H-Blunt skill was about 35. The weapon NEVER started to
proc until my skill got up into the 70+ range and now since it is over 100,
I also find that it usually procs at least once per battle.

Maybe a combination of level, weapon skill, and DEX play into this. Another
thing is that I had the shaman DEX buff (don't know if it is monkey or cat)
last night and my DEX was into the upper 20's and the mace proc'd several
times per battle.

-Faras
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
> Sent: Thursday, September 02, 1999 10:17 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] thoughts on screaming mace?
>
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> I use a Screaming Mace and it procs a lot at 16th level Dex
> 112. I see it
> proc every fight and most fights it procs several times.
> I've even had it
> proc on three sucessive attacks. I have spent entire fights
> yaulped for
> over a minute. Not sure why you aren't seeing many procs,
> but could just be
> some bad days of clumpy random number generation.
>
> Kitasi screaming away happily on E'ci
